c74object.name: rtt.makenote~

attribute.name: velocity
attribute.digest: Default velocity of MIDI notes. This value is overridden by a nonzero signal sent to the third inlet.

attribute.name: duration
attribute.digest: Sets the default amount of time in milliseconds between note on and note off events when noteoff is enabled. This value is overridden by a nonzero signal sent to the third inlet.

attribute.name: channel
attribute.digest: Channel to transmit MIDI messages on.

attribute.name: noteoff
attribute.digest: Determines whether or not the object should automatically schedule note off events for any note on events generated.

attribute.name: autointerval
attribute.digest: When auto is enabled, sets the minimum amount of time in milliseconds between sampling events.

attribute.name: auto
attribute.digest: When enabled, value changes to the first inlet can be sampled and output automatically.

c74object.description: rtt.makenote accepts signals representing a note trigger, note value, velocity, pitch bend and duration and outputs MIDI note messages. The object can be configured to sample automatically when the note value changes, or sampling can be triggered with an impulse to the second inlet.
